title: Accessibility statement
body: We support accessible access and invite requests for reasonable accommodations.

title: Clay & materials policy
body: Use approved clay bodies and glazes. Ask for approval before introducing new materials.

title: Community conduct
body: Respect, safety, and shared-space etiquette are required across studio and support channels.

title: Damage & responsibility
body: Firing carries process variation. Damage from service or handling is reviewed case-by-case.

title: Firing & scheduling policy
body: Submit firings through the portal. Turnaround estimates and scheduling windows are provided with status updates if windows shift.

title: Media accessibility standard
body: Public speech media should include captions. Long media should include transcript access.

title: Payment, refunds, and cancellations
body: Payment and refund timing is tied to workflow stage and transaction state.

title: Safety & kiln rules
body: Follow posted kiln safety guidance at all times. Keep dust controlled, use required PPE, and label all kiln-bound work.

title: Storage limits & abandoned work
body: Storage limits depend on membership tier and available space. Long-abandoned work may move through notice and follow-up steps.

title: Studio access & supervision
body: Reservations are required for all visits. Access details and any supervised equipment requirements are listed in the portal.
